pageProduct.name: Antipodes Ananda Toner 100ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Premium botanical extracts blend with the natural minerals in pure 15,000-year-old Waiwera artesian water that springs from deep within the New Zealand earth. Omega and antioxidant-rich raspberry seed assists in increasing lipid content and decreasing moisture loss. Aloe vera and anti-inflammatory marshmallow act to soothe irritated or stressed skin. Mamaku black fern helps regenerate and foster healthy cells.
Elements of Beauty: Waiwera artesian water * Mamaku black fern * Raspberry seed oil
Pure Plant Fragrance: Bulgarian rose
e100ml / 3.3fl oz

Warnings

EXTERNAL APPLICATION ONLY. PATCH TEST PRIOR TO USE. IN UNLIKELY EVENT OF NEGATIVE REACTION DISCONTINUE USE AND CONSULT HEALTH PRACTITIONER. RECYCLABLE GLASS. HANDLE WITH CARE. STORE IN COOL DARK PLACE BELOW 21°C. COLOUR AND CLARITY MAY VARY BETWEEN PRODUCTS DUE TO PURE NATURAL CONTENT. GOLD FLAKES MAY DISSOLVE AND ARE NOT ALWAYS VISIBLE. LOVE NATURE

Common Uses

SKINCARE

Ingredients

Aqua (Waiwera® artesian) water, Aloe barbadensis (aloe vera leaf) extract*, Cyathea medullaris (mamaku black fern leaf) extract, gluconolactone, sodium benzoate, dehydroacetic acid, benzyl alcohol, bisobolol, Althaea officinalis (marshmallow) extract, Rubus idaeus (raspberry) extract, Rosa damasca (Bulgarian rose) oil*.

†   Component of essential oil
*    Certified organic ingredient

Directions

Spray generously across your face, neck and décolletage several times a day for an immediate moisture boost and relief from environmental aggressors. Suited to irritated and sun-damaged skin conditions, and dermatologically approved for sensitive skin.
